title: The Little Wife of the General
overview: Su Qian is a chef at a restaurant with three Michelin stars. Escaping from another blind date arranged by her caring mother, the girl gets hit by a car and is transported to the past. Now she has only three months to find her love, otherwise she will never come home. But, fortunately, the next day Su Qian is married off to a domineering handsome general, only he doesn't even want to see her. Maybe unique cooking skills will pave the way for the girl to the heart of an unapproachable general?
